tuto1: Welcome to PolyQuiz! Click "Start" if you'd like to follow the tutorial. You can close it anytime by clicking "Close".
tuto2: Learn how to join a game by clicking "Next.".
tuto3: Enter a 4-digit code to join a game.
tuto4: You can choose to view ongoing games by clicking "In progress", or waiting games by clicking "Waiting to start".
tuto5: Learn how to create a game by clicking "Next."
tuto6: Here, you can find details about all available games.
tuto7: You can use the left and right arrows to scroll through the games.
tuto8: You can reserve the game for your friends and set an entry price.
tuto9: Learn how to manage a game by clicking "Next.".
tuto10: In this section, you can create a new quiz or sort existing quizzes by category.
tuto11: You can view all existing games and edit them as needed.
